title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 
-Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and 
Businesses) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 19th day of July

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) Regulations 2020
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and Businesses) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 296 of 2020) are amended by the insertion in Part A of the Schedule 
to those Regulations of the following: 

“13. Airports. 

14 

Ports.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 July, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [359] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations make amendments to Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Face Coverings in Certain Premises and 
Businesses) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 296 of 2020) to add ports and airports 
to the list of premises in which face coverings must be worn.
